definitions.body: jaw, jawbone, of animal, Ju Jdg 15:15, Jdg 15:16, Jdg 15:16, Jdg 15:17 (under jaw of ass), cf. n.pr.loc. [[רָכַת לֶָחִי]] v:Jdg 15:17; in sim. [[עַלּ־לְחֵיהֶם]] [[כִּמְרִימֵי עׂל]] Ho 11:4 like those lifting up a yoke from upon (rd. [[מֵעַל]] ?) their jaws (Isr. under fig. of oxen); of sacrificial ox or sheep De 18:3; of crocodile Job 40:26; of Pharaoh under fig. of [[תַּנִּים]] Ez Eze 29:4 (cf. v:Eze 29:3); cf. Eze 38:4, Is 30:28.
cheek, of man 1Ki 22:24 = 2Ch 18:23, Job 16:10, Ps 3:8, Ct So 5:13, Is 50:6, La 3:30, Mic 4:14; of woman Ct So 1:10, La 1:2 (fig. of Jerusalem).
